entity.description: Validate eBPF functionality in NixOS VM environment. Check if eBPF programs can load, if kernel capabilities are available, and if the eBPF fallback/simulation mode works correctly when kernel features are unavailable.
entity.outcome: eBPF capabilities successfully validated. eBPF manager initializes correctly, loads programs from environment variables, gracefully handles missing programs with fallback mode. All eBPF infrastructure working as designed.
entity.title: Test DOTS Family Mode eBPF Capabilities in VM
